thread.title: TOWIE's James Argent embarrasses his little sister in awkward encounter on Take Me Out
thread.title_full: TOWIE's James Argent embarrasses his little sister in awkward encounter on Take Me Out

author: Nicola Oakley
title: TOWIE's James Argent embarrasses his little sister in awkward encounter on Take Me Out
text:
TOWIE's James Argent embarrasses his little sister in awkward encounter on Take Me Out It's the last man she expected to see - and she couldn't turn her light off fast enough Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now James Argent on Take Me Out with his sister Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
If you were a young woman appearing on a dating show, you might get your hopes up that you would meet the man of your dreams: tall, dark and handsome, looking dashing in a nice suit. 
So spare a thought for Natasha Argent, who was looking for love on Take Me Out when the last man she expected appeared in front of her eyes: her older brother, 29-year-old TOWIE star James. 
As the love lift lowered, Natasha looked horrified, started turning red and grasped at the girls around her for support. She was absolutely horrified when she saw her brother (Photo: ITV) 
She could then be seen mouthing 'oh my god'. Yeah, Natasha, we don't blame you - and sympathetic viewers were cringing over the awkward moment. 
Once Arg had stopped parading around the room for the girls to get a good look at him, it was time for Paddy to ask the girls if they were "turned on or turned off". 
There was only one red light after first impressions - and, of course, it came from his sister. She wasn't going to risk leaving her light on (Photo: ITV) 
His response? "I'm not going to Fernando's with my sister." We should hope not! 
Arg eventually ended up bagging a date with redhead Shauni and had a great time splashing about at a water park. James Argent gets a date on Take Me Out (Photo: ITV) 
Hopefully Natasha will get a trip to Fernandos soon enough - and then the two can compare around the dinner table. Like us on Facebook
